articles.description: The Centre has allowed domestic airlines to deploy up to 70 percent of their flight capacity from an earlier 60 percent, with immediate effect. Till now, the Centre had permitted only 60 percent capacity utilization in the domestic sector.
articles.content:
The Centre on Wednesday, 11 November, allowed domestic airlines to deploy up to 70 per cent of their flight capacity from an earlier 60 percent, with immediate effect.
